title: RGB Has No Place On This Memory!
description: Thermaltake surprised us this year.  In some markets at least, they're listening to feedback by moving away from RGB and towards a more neutral color pallet.  Not only that but the non-RGB products are actually less expensive.    Subscribe    Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera (Dmitry) -  Main Lens (Dmitry) -  Main Camera (Eber) -  Main Lens (Eber) -  Main 2nd Lens (Eber) -  Main Camera Mic (D & E) -  Cheap 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Awesome Slider -  Our Shotgun Mic -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #thermaltaketoughram #ces2020 #hardwarecanucks
